entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard who is also Harry's mentor.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist in the story, a dark wizard.

entities.name: nagini
entities.description: A snake that is also one of Voldemort's Horcruxes.

entities.name: ravenclaw
entities.description: One of the four houses at Hogwarts.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: One of the four houses at Hogwarts.

entities.name: horcruxes
entities.description: Objects that contain a piece of Voldemort's soul.

relationships.description: Nagini is one of Voldemort's Horcruxes, as revealed by Dumbledore.
Dumbledore knows about the Horcruxes and their behavior.
